channel.title: Run.bat error I need some help please
channel.description:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
if anyone knows what this means or how to fix it please help. Thank you

item.title: Run.bat error I need some help please
item.dc:creator: @jokerxx420 jokerxx420
item.description:
@jokerxx420 wrote:

what do i set them to?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 04:42:07 am[/size][hr]Like what is the default enviromental variables? i havnt a clue what they are, ive searched for em. I just changed my environmental variables to CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%; thats the classpath, C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin; thats the path, please help :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 05:00:19 am[/size][hr]any1? please. im really in desperate need for this to run. im bored:( please

Read full topic
